page.title: 04THE LATE KINGS ARMS
page.content: The 'Late Kings Arms'was the first pub,built several hundred years ago.Soon after, it was converted into a house.A new pub'The Stoke Canon Inn'was built opposite.Before being built the land used to be a coal yard. Mr.Dewley was the first land lord,then he passed the position down to his son,but a new land lord soon had to be found because Mr.Dewleys son drowned himself.Mr.Wright was next, then Mr.Wall came along.He is still there now in 1985.They have converted the pub quite a lot from a small bar to a large bar and what used to be the cellar,is now the lounge.Since Mr.Wall has been there they have had quite a few famous people visting .Terry Wogan is one of them.Also they have had a few television announcers.
